name: What's in the Cellar
description:
Explore, investigate, and survive. What's in the Cellar, a game made by new indie developers SirMiles & SirPugithy. A short, challenging experience, which could be enjoyed after a couple playthroughs.

What's in the Cellar was created for the "Callum Upton" game jam under the theme Horror.  The game was made from scratch in 6 days time, and we know there is room for improvement / suggestion.  Please leave comments!

In the future, the game may be added upon. Currently, there are no plans to do so. 

Note: this game contains flashy images. Also note: this is a reposted game on our new profile, as the original post was for a game jam.
